codeBlocks.code:
Button Variant?
├─ Most important action on page? → variant="primary" (MAX 1)
├─ Destructive action? → variant="danger" + confirmation
├─ Alternative action? → variant="secondary"
└─ Cancel/dismiss? → variant="ghost" or "outline"

Card Variant?
├─ Glass effect needed? → variant="glass"
├─ Gradient background? → variant="gradient"
├─ Simple border? → variant="outlined"
└─ Default solid? → variant="default"

Input State?
├─ User input valid? → state="default" (blue focus ring)
├─ Validation error? → state="error" (red border + message)
├─ Field disabled? → disabled={true} (opacity-50)
└─ Read-only display? → readOnly={true} + muted styling

## Section 2: Quick Reference Cards

### 2.1 Most-Used Colors

| Color | Hex | RGB | Tailwind | Use Case |
|-------|-----|-----|----------|----------|
| **Primary-600** | `#2563eb` | `rgb(37, 99, 235)` | `bg-primary-600` | Primary buttons, main CTAs |
| **Primary-500** | `#3b82f6` | `rgb(59, 130, 246)` | `bg-primary-500` | Links, accents |
| **Secondary-600** | `#0d9488` | `rgb(13, 148, 136)` | `bg-secondary-600` | Secondary actions |
| **Success** | `#22c55e` | `rgb(34, 197, 94)` | `bg-success` | Success states, credit |
| **Error** | `#ef4444` | `rgb(239, 68, 68)` | `bg-error` | Error states, debit, danger |
| **Warning** | `#f59e0b` | `rgb(245, 158, 11)` | `bg-warning` | Warnings, pending states |
| **Info** | `#3b82f6` | `rgb(59, 130, 246)` | `bg-info` | Info messages |
| **White/10** | `rgba(255,255,255,0.1)` | - | `bg-white/10` | Glass backgrounds |
| **Black/40** | `rgba(0,0,0,0.4)` | - | `bg-black/40` | Overlays, backdrops |

### 2.2 Spacing Scale (8pt Grid)

| Token | Rem | Px | Tailwind | Common Use |
|-------|-----|----|----|-----------|
| 0 | 0 | 0 | `p-0`, `m-0` | Reset spacing |
| 1 | 0.25rem | 4px | `p-1`, `m-1` | Micro spacing |
| 2 | 0.5rem | 8px | `p-2`, `m-2` | XS spacing, tight padding |
| 3 | 0.75rem | 12px | `p-3`, `m-3` | Badge padding |
| 4 | 1rem | 16px | `p-4`, `m-4` | **Standard padding** |
| 6 | 1.5rem | 24px | `p-6`, `m-6` | **Card padding** |
| 8 | 2rem | 32px | `p-8`, `m-8` | Page padding |
| 12 | 3rem | 48px | `p-12`, `m-12` | Section spacing |
| 16 | 4rem | 64px | `p-16`, `m-16` | Large gaps |

### 2.3 Typography Quick Lookup

| Scale | Size | Rem | Px | Line Height | Use Case |
|-------|------|-----|----|----|----------|
| xs | `text-xs` | 0.75rem | 12px | 1rem | Helper text, captions |
| sm | `text-sm` | 0.875rem | 14px | 1.25rem | Small text, labels |
| base | `text-base` | 1rem | 16px | 1.5rem | **Body text** |
| lg | `text-lg` | 1.125rem | 18px | 1.75rem | Large body |
| xl | `text-xl` | 1.25rem | 20px | 1.75rem | H5 |
| 2xl | `text-2xl` | 1.5rem | 24px | 2rem | **H4** |
| 3xl | `text-3xl` | 1.875rem | 30px | 2.25rem | **H3** |
| 4xl | `text-4xl` | 2.25rem | 36px | 2.5rem | **H2** |
| 5xl | `text-5xl` | 3rem | 48px | 1 | **H1** |

### 2.4 Component Variant Quick Decision

```
Button Variant?
├─ Most important action on page? → variant="primary" (MAX 1)
├─ Destructive action? → variant="danger" + confirmation
├─ Alternative action? → variant="secondary"
└─ Cancel/dismiss? → variant="ghost" or "outline"

Card Variant?
├─ Glass effect needed? → variant="glass"
├─ Gradient background? → variant="gradient"
├─ Simple border? → variant="outlined"
└─ Default solid? → variant="default"

Input State?
├─ User input valid? → state="default" (blue focus ring)
├─ Validation error? → state="error" (red border + message)
├─ Field disabled? → disabled={true} (opacity-50)
└─ Read-only display? → readOnly={true} + muted styling
```

### 2.5 Fintech Data Formatting Cheat Sheet

| Data Type | Format | Example | Function |
|-----------|--------|---------|----------|
| Currency (INR) | ₹X,XX,XXX.XX | ₹1,23,456.78 | `formatINR(amount)` |
| Currency (Compact) | ₹X.XL or ₹X.XCr | ₹1.5L, ₹2.3Cr | `formatCompact(amount)` |
| Date & Time | DD MMM YYYY, HH:mm IST | 15 Jan 2025, 14:30 IST | `formatDate(date)` |
| Date Only | DD MMM YYYY | 15 Jan 2025 | `formatShortDate(date)` |
| Email (Masked) | j***@e*.com | j***@e*.com | `maskEmail(email)` |
| Phone (Masked) | 98****10** | 98****10** | `maskPhone(phone)` |
| PAN (Masked) | ABCDEX234F | ABCDEX234F | `maskPAN(pan)` |
| Account (Masked) | ****1234 | ****1234 | `maskAccount(account)` |

### 2.6 Common Animations

| Animation | Duration | Easing | Tailwind | Use Case |
|-----------|----------|--------|----------|----------|
| Fade In | 0.5s | ease-out | `animate-fade-in` | Modals, toasts |
| Slide In Bottom | 0.5s | ease-out | `animate-slide-in-bottom` | Drawers, sheets |
| Scale In | 0.3s | ease-out | `animate-scale-in` | Popovers, tooltips |
| Shimmer | 1.5s | linear infinite | `animate-shimmer` | Skeleton loaders |
| Pulse Slow | 3s | ease infinite | `animate-pulse-slow` | Attention grabbers |
| Gradient | 8s | linear infinite | `animate-gradient` | Background effects |
